title: The Spider-Man Drama Continues - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.06.20
description:
Imran and Tim discuss how Spider-Man in Avengers came to be, Nintendo's insane sales quarter, xCloud leaving iOS, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:29 - Housekeeping
Shout-out to our friends Gary Whitta and Steve Spohn. Gary had Selina Gomez on Animal Talking last night and Steve just put up a video for Able Gamers with Ryan Renoylds. Check both out online!
HUGE DAY OF STREAMS:
We’re live reacting to PlayStation’s State of Play Today at 1 pm PT.
Nick, Blessing, Andy, and Greg are streaming Fall Guys after around 2 pm PT.
THEN, Friday, we’re streaming the Avengers Beta Friday at 2 pm PT.
All on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames and later on youtube.com/kindafunnygames.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:11:18 - Marvel's Avengers: How Spider-Man Became a PlayStationCharacter
00:17:48 - Am I wrong to believe that crossplay is very important to the type game Answers is going to be? - Best Friends Q:Grezic
00:23:00 - Microsoft ends iOS xCloud testing, launching as Android exclusive (Mike Peterson @ Apple Insider)
00:33:00 - Street Fighter 5 Announces New Characters, Including Akira From Rival Schools (Mitchell Saltzman @ IGN)
00:38:20 - Animal Crossing: New Horizons' Sales Reach 22 Million as Nintendo's Net Profits Rise Over 500% Year-On-Year (Adam Bankhurst @ IGN)
00:48:00 - Pikmin 3 removed from the Wii U eShop (Brian @ Nintendo Everything)
00:54:00 - DOOM Eternal and Skyrim coming to PS5, Series X - Press Release
00:55:30 -  HIMS
00:56:50 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:59:00 - Do you think we will get to a point where people forget that it even existed? - Nicole Humphrey
01:02:34 - Squad Up: Frankfurtter(Quiz Show) - Twitch
